text: Seven Minutes in Heaven is a 1985 American teen romance comedy movie directed by Linda Feferman and stars Jennifer Connelly, Byron Thames, Maddie Corman, Michael Zaslow, Lauren Holly, Denny Dillon. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 romantic comedy movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Seven Minutes in Heaven (movie)
